meanings.definition: A person who sings exceptionally well.
meanings.sent1: The supersinger wowed the audience with their beautiful voice.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the supersinger of our school choir.
meanings.sent3: The supersinger made even the birds jealous with their melodious tunes.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like that of a magical supersinger, enchanting all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The supersinger's performance was so captivating that it brought tears to many eyes.

meanings.sent1: I aspire to supersinger like my favorite singer one day.
meanings.sent2: He always manages to supersinger at every karaoke night.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to supersinger along with the radio, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her voice seemed to supersinger through the storm, bringing hope to all who heard.
meanings.sent5: The wind carried her song far and wide, as if she could supersinger to the heavens themselves.
